title: Contacts and owner
description: Each domain name is linked to 4 types of roles.
info: Only the Owner and Administrator roles can modify contacts.

roles.owner: Person in whose name the domain is registered.
roles.tech: Manages technical aspects of the service.

ownerHint: The owner is set when registering the domain.

change.title: Change {{type}} contact
change.validationInfo: An email will be sent to the new contact for validation. The change will be effective after validation.
